column4: i accidentally installed grub on MBR, now windows won't boot, any help?
will fixmbr correct the error? or fixboot on windows?
and remember ubuntu assigns hd0,0 tu windows, now everytime i select windows on grub, the grub restarts it loops.
i accidentally installed grub on MBR, now windows won't boot, any help? will fixmbr correct this problem or fixboot?
WPA is not supported on ubuntu?
how do i set it up
possibly not supported on your wifi device/driver
you using ndiswrapper or a native driver?
the driver for you network card, ndiswrapper uses the windows driver inside a "wrapper" that can make it work on linux and native drivers are linux open source driver
you can not enable wpa if your interface card does not support it
so i need to download the driver?
are you using the wireless network now under ubunt??
read this doc, it tells you everything: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WPAHowto
